attributes.title: Panick attack, phone so glitchy, and ultimately just terrified.
attributes.review: I was going about my morning, when I found out about this app. I figured, let me download it to see what the hype was all about. I thought, “it can’t be THAT bad can it?” (I woke up to texts talking about how awful this app was for them, and I wanted to see if it was really as bad as they all described.) Well, I was proven wrong. V E R Y wrong. As soon as I opened the app, I was so overwhelmed and just utterly shocked when I saw a giant, wrinkly, orange thumb with some weird fluff on the top of it, just appear on my page. It was terrifying. Needless to say, I freaked out. I was panicking. THEN, as if a panic attack want bad enough, I started getting weird glitches on my phone, and this is a pretty new- ish phone (an iPhone 8), so I was dumbfounded when it started screwing up, right when I opened the app. My keyboard was all jumbled, and nothing could come out right. Everything was just wrong. Luckily after deleting the app things cleared up some. But I was just completely terrified because of this app, and I don’t mean your first time at a haunted house terrified. I mean someone is chasing you down the block with a knife, and you call everyone you can think of, and no one believes you, you can’t shake him, so you just have to just be chased by a rabid killer who is locked on you, kind of terrified. Overall, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE. I think I might have some trauma that will stay with me for quite some time. Do NOT GET THIS APP. Absolutely awful and useless.  Save yourself the panic.
